captions.text:
- I HAD A LOT OF FUN
HOSTING THE OSCARS.

THERE WAS A CAMERA FOLLOWING ME
AROUND

FROM THE DAY
THAT WE STARTED REHEARSING

ALL WEEK AND ALL BACKSTAGE
THROUGHOUT THE SHOW.
I WANT TO SHOW YOU A LITTLE BIT

ABOUT THE--WHAT HAPPENED
BEHIND THE SCENES RIGHT NOW.

- I TOLD YOU WHAT I DID
OVER THE SUMMER,

AND I FORGOT TO MENTION
SOMETHING PRETTY BIG.

I ACTUALLY AGREED TO HOST
THE ACADEMY AWARDS AGAIN.
CRAZY'S WHAT THEY THINK ABOUT ME

all: TOO QUICK FOR THE LINES
THEY THROW

- I SHOULD BE IN THE MIDDLE.
YOU KNOW, SHE'S THE HOST.

- I'M NOT ON CAMERA ANYMORE,
AM I?

- YOU CAN SEE THAT ALL RIGHT
THOUGH, RIGHT?

- WELL, WHEN I'M BEHIND IT,
IT'S BETTER.

- WHAT I DON'T WANT IS IT
TO START COMING UP

WHEN I'M STANDING RIGHT
OVER IT.

- OH, MY GOD, BONO, COULD YOU
TAKE A PICTURE OF ME?

WHAT'S IT LIKE TO LOOK UP
AND SEE YOURSELF THERE?

AND I MOVED IT HERE
TO HELP THEM OUT.

YOU'RE NOT GONNA KNOW
WHAT I'M DOING.
I'M NOT GONNA LET YOU KNOW.

- I THINK I MIGHT JUST SAY
I'M TRYING

TO BREAK THE RECORD
FOR THE MOST RETWEETED PICTURE.

I REALLY HOPE THAT EVERYONE
JUMPS IN THIS PICTURE.

I KEEP THINKING--I MEAN,
THAT WILL BE AMAZING

- SEEMS TO ME LIKE WE NEED TO
FIND A SOMMELIER A LITTLE BIT.

- DO I NEED TO SAY
SHE'S FROM KENYA?
JUST SO PROUD OF THE JOKE.

IF YOU FEEL LIKE HAPPINESS
IS THE TRUTH

CLAP ALONG IF YOU KNOW
WHAT HAPPINESS IS TO YOU

CLAP ALONG IF YOU FEEL
LIKE THAT'S WHAT YOU WANNA DO

PEOPLE ARE BEING ASKED
TO TAKE THEIR SEATS.

AND THE OSCARS IS ABOUT
TO START.
- OH, MY GOD, THAT WAS SO QUICK.

- WAIT--WAS THAT ME
THAT YOU SAID THAT TO?

- ARE YOU GOING OUT NOW?
'CAUSE WE'RE STARTING.

WE SHOULD PROBABLY--
- YEAH, I NEED TO GO SIT DOWN.

- I THINK YOU SHOULD.
- YOU SHOULD GO GET ONSTAGE.

- AND I THINK YOU SHOULD THINK
OF YOURSELVES AS WINNERS.

NOT ALL OF YOU, BUT THE PEOPLE
WHO'VE WON BEFORE SHOULD
AND I KNOW WHAT YOU'RE THINKING.

"ELLEN, THAT'S EASY FOR YOU
TO SAY.

AND THAT'S SORT OF THE HIGHEST
AWARD THERE IS."

DOWN IN THE COMFORT
OF STRANGERS

- BLAH, BLAH, BLAH,
BLAH, BLAH, BLAH.

THAT'S PROBABLY
WHAT IT'S GONNA SOUND LIKE.

- I'M GONNA GO OUT
AND SAY EXACTLY THAT NOW.

- OKAY, THAT'S GOOD.
LOOK AT US.

DOWN IN THE COMFORT
OF STRANGERS

- JARED LETO JUMPING IN--
HE RAN OVER.

- WHEN I LOOK DOWN
AT THIS GOLDEN STATUE,

MAY IT REMIND ME
AND EVERY LITTLE CHILD

THAT NO MATTER
WHERE YOU'RE FROM,

- YOU WENT, AND IT WAS
A BEAUTIFUL SPEECH.
OH, GOD, WHICH WAY DO I GO?

- HOW ARE YOU?
- GOOD TO SEE YOU.

- WITH THAT PICTURE?
- WELL, I'M SHOCKED.

- WE MADE HISTORY.
- OH, MY GOD.

- ONE OF US SHOULD HAVE FLASHED
A BOOB.

THAT'S THE ONLY WAY--WE WOULD
HAVE SHUT DOWN THE INTERNET.

- ALL RIGHT, HERE WE GO.
- WE HAVE TIME.

- THEY SAID--
THEY SAID THAT YOU--

- I QUIT,
AND YOU'RE TAKING OVER?

- YOU CAN FINISH IT.
FINISH IT FOR ME.

- I CAN'T EXPRESS MY GRATITUDE
ENOUGH FOR

THANK YOU.
I LOVE YOU ALL.

- I MEAN IT.
THANK YOU ALL.

SO MANY PEOPLE TO THANK.
THANK YOU.

WE'LL BE BACK
WITH SARAH JESSICA PARKER.

title: Behind the Scenes at the Oscars

comments.text:
I think that its true what they say about Oscar Awards and actors its like 
they live in another dimension up in the sky . its a very private elite 
club, / And to make things worse they had picked a hostess who, to put it 
blanty its very and very famous just to highilite the exclusivity of this 
club even more in the audience. I feel like oscar is just like a little 
party among some of the most wallthy people in the world, so why instead of 
callng Grammy Awards they call it VIP Awards I mean the only moves that are 
winning are always produced and made byt he same directors and the actors 
are always the same them. who come around and bacj agan every now and then. 
Think about it if you llook bakc at the History of Grammies its very 
unlikely to see an unknown film maker getting any kind of prizes, the ones 
winning them are always the same !!!!! its a privaete celebration of a tiny 
group of wealthy people. Im so sorry to say that its heart of the matter, 
at least from my perspective. ﻿
